title: Does the education system matter? Exploring in-depth joint school attendance, hazardous and non-hazardous activities in artisanal and small-scale mining in the Democratic Republic of the Congo
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Isidore Murhi Mihigo, Guillaume Vermeylen, Bugandwa Munguakonkwa
